::KitKat::

She listened intently on what Destructor had to say.  She wanteed to 
know more.  She thought that now was a good time to have Cyber Claw 
distracted for a while. She walked up to Drillbit. "Love, I can trust 
you.  Would you take Cyber Claw on a limited tour of the base.  Show 
her the messhall, a glimps of the bridge, the engine room, the 
outside of the ship.  I know you won't let her see the high security 
areas. Please also find out all you can about her and the other 
group."  She kissed his cheek and walked back into the ship. She 
followed Destructor to find out what his spies had all found out.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Destructor grabbed Kit kat by the arm quickly and whispered in her 
ear..."I 
> have a source. I bieleve if we act quickly we have a good chance of 
takeing 
> the alliance. You must inderstand..my spies have found alliances 
with bots 
> from large destron fleets to maximals. This is what will make the 
Preadacons 
> rise to the empire they where. We will discuss this more later." he 
gently 
> let go of her arm and bowed. He decided not to kiss her hand in 
fear of 
> jealousy of that bot.."I will be back in a moment I must check 
something...." 
> he quickly left
